mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `user` ( username, nickname, `password`, telphone, avatar, openid, unionid, is_disable ) VALUES ( #{username}, #{nickname}, #{password}, #{telphone}, #{avatar}, #{openid}, #{unionid}, #{is_disable} );
mapper.select: select a.* from `user` a where a.username = #{username}
select a.* from `user` a where a.id = #{user_id}
